metadata.title: CVE-2016-3070 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The trace_writeback_dirty_page implementation ininclude/trace/events/writeback.h in the Linux kernel before 4.4 improperlyinteracts with mm/migrate.c, which allows local users to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference and system crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact by triggering a certain page move.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3070` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
